Just phenomenal..
I travel from DFW to the Midland/Odessa area on a regular basis for work, and after losing my patience with the decline in service at overpriced hotels, I finally wised up and started using Airbnb for business trips, instead of just personal trips. And this was my first time doing so. And it did not disappoint!! I have zero regret, other than I didn’t start sooner!
This place was amazing, to say the very least. The workspace in the bedroom is absolutely perfect. The desk looks classic and is made from beautiful, real wood.. but has all the new technology hidden inside of it! It raises and lowers automatically to allow for standing or sitting, which allowed me to continue working without having to take standing breaks, due to my lower back pain. And to top it off, the view from the desk through the gorgeous, wide open windows into the back yard, full of REAL grass and shaded by big oak trees, was a breath of fresh air. The squirrels running around added some entertainment. Reminded me of home.
The bedroom itself was very spacious and comfortable. Nice cozy bed and bedding, with very nice bedside tables. And me being used to having a large tv in the bedroom at home, it was nice to have that there as well. And the bathroom was perfect. Loved the shower, loved the design, the closet, literally everything.
I really enjoyed the big open concept in the living and dining room, with the large windows letting in all the light and providing the nice view of the backyard. All the furniture, decor, and nice big TV was much better than I had expected! Very comfortable and welcoming environment. Hope to put the fireplace to use next time!
And the kitchen was incredible. Very updated with all stainless appliances, and everything you need to cook a meal if you choose to do so. Including a very nice gas range.
And last, but definitely not least, the backyard…. The backyard is not shared, so you have the entire covered back patio area, as well as the whole yard, all to yourself. And it is the perfect spot to kick back and have coffee in the mornings and get the wheels turning, and also an adult beverage in the evenings to wind down. The neighborhood is quiet, and the only things running wild are the squirrels. And they are fun to watch. They stay busy collecting acorns until nighttime every day, lol.
I highly recommend Runway 25. It’s the perfect home away from home, and made my business trip a much more pleasant trip than I could ever ask for. Scott is the most responsive, communicative, and friendly host I’ve ever had the pleasure of dealing with. 5 stars all around!!!
